amendment.description: An amendment numbered 26 printed in House Report 119-232 to eliminate funding for the Advanced Technology Vehicles Manufacturing Loan Program and transfers to the SRA.
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to reduce funding for the Advanced Technology Vehicles Manufacturing Loan Program by $13 million and increase the Spending Reduction Account by a similar amount.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Perry amendment (A007) Failed by recorded vote: 140 - 286 (Roll no. 230).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Perry amendment (A007) Failed by recorded vote: 140 - 286 (Roll no. 230).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
